title: "index out of bounds: the len is 1 buit the index is 2" when compiling `time` on docs.rs

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
### Description It's hard for me to provide a MRE, since I can't reproduce the error locally or on GitHub pipelines. The compilation of docs of my crate [fails on docs.rs](https://docs.rs/crate/rsonpath/0.1.0/builds/593904) with an internal compiler error when compiling the `time` crate (v0.3.9). I've created an issue at [docs.rs repo](https://github.com/rust-lang/docs.rs/issues/1769) and asked for a rebuild, but it failed with the same error. My [docs pipeline succeeds on newest nightly](https://github.com/V0ldek/rsonpath/runs/7358690494?check_suite_focus=true), it also works when I run `docs` locally on Ubuntu 22 (x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu). ### Error output See the two builds on docs.rs: https://docs.rs/crate/rsonpath/0.1.0/builds/593904, https://docs.rs/crate/rsonpath/0.1.0/builds/593800
Backtrace
